        public void setOrder(int order)
        Set order of marker with respect to other markers on the mapview. Shape with higher order will be on top
        Parameters:
        order - draw order

      • setInfoWindowOffset

        public void setInfoWindowOffset(android.graphics.Point infoWindowOffset)
        Set info window offset. Set x and y coordinates with respect to marker By default x = 0, y = 0 means info window placed at top of marker
        Parameters:
        infoWindowOffset - x and y coordinates.

      • showInfoWindow

        public void showInfoWindow()
        Show info window of the marker, custom info window will be shown if set, else shows default info window if marker title or description is set. Info window will always be recreated or refreshed whenever this method gets called.

      • hideInfoWindow

        public void hideInfoWindow()
